column4: hey does anyone know how i can configure Ubuntu to use a different swap partition? I deleted the original swap partition that it was using, which was a primary partition and I want it to use a swap partition that I created in an extended partition
dead easy, just use fstab to point at the new partition
make sure you've done a mkswap on it first though
error 22 is a grub error, you must have done something to make that happen
